com.appiancorp.suiteapi.common.exceptions

Class RetryableAppianRuntimeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.appiancorp.suiteapi.common.exceptions.AppianRuntimeException
            • com.appiancorp.suiteapi.common.exceptions.RetryableAppianRuntimeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Retryable, java.io.Serializable

    public class RetryableAppianRuntimeException
extends AppianRuntimeException
implements Retryable
    A subclass of AppianRuntimeException that indicates that the exception is transient and the operation can be safely retried.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
